Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Creature
      • Person
        • Player

  • public class Player
extends Person
    Player is the class to store unique information about a user
    Author:
    Bennett Forkner

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              int hp,
              int strength,
              java.lang.String catchPhrase,
              int cash)
        The constructor for a Player Object with an empty Inventory
        Parameters:
        name - The friendly name of the Creature
        hp - The Health Points of the Creature
        strength - The Strength of the Creature's attacks
        catchPhrase - The catch phrase of the Creature
        cash - The starting cash on-hand that a Player has

      • Player

        The constructor for a Player Object with an Inventory
        Parameters:
        name - The friendly name of the Creature
        hp - The Health Points of the Creature
        strength - The Strength of the Creature's attacks
        catchPhrase - The catch phrase of the Creature
        cash - The starting cash on-hand that a Player has
        inventory - The starting inventory of a Player

      • canBuy

        public boolean canBuy(Item i)
        The method to check if the Player can buy a certain Item
        Parameters:
        i - The Item to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the Player can buy the Item, else false

      • payFor

        public int payFor(Item i)
        The method to lower a Player's cash on-hand by the amount that an Item costs
        Parameters:
        i - The Item to be paid for
        Returns:
        The cash that a Player has left if they can buy the Item, else -1
